abstract: Clothing designer Charlotte Ronson, low-profile sister to celebrity DJ Samantha Ronson, has quietly evolved into one of the most successful retail entrepreneurs of her generation; her burgeoning fashion empire includes both upmarket and cheaper-priced clothing lines and a beauty collection that arrives at Sephora in Fall 2011; description of other members of her famous clan noted.
snippet: Charlotte Ronson, decidedly less flashy than her twin, the D.J., has quietly evolved into one of the most successful retail entrepreneurs of her generation.
lead_paragraph: Charlotte Ronson, decidedly less flashy than her twin, the D.J., has quietly evolved into one of the most successful retail entrepreneurs of her generation.

headline.main: A Golden Touch Without the Glitter
headline.print_headline: A Golden Touch Without the Glitter
headline.seo: The Girl With the Golden Touch
